entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 13 except 9 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 13 except 9 along parts of the coast. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Rain beginning before morning. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 13.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023
